transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan Anand sahab Himanshu baat kar raha hun India Mart se aap kaise hain?
Executive: Ji badhiya.
Customer: Ji ji abhi Sushmita se discussion hui thi aapki right?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sushmita ji se discussion hui thi aapki services ke regarding India Mart ke.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji. Keh raha tha main isko na leads vagaira jo hum log share kar rahe hain na sir please wo daily basis pe consume kijiye bilkul bhi leads ka hamara consumption bilkul hi kam ho gaya jo by lead wo share kar rahi hai na aapko. Theek hai unko aap consume karna start karo sir aap. Bilkul hi consumption last do teen hafte se bilkul bhi consume aap kar hi nahi rahe ho.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai.
Executive: Jo kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Yes ji bol raha hun. Are char minute ho gaye mere ko. Hmm. Do minute ruko.
Executive: Aur jo theek hai jo direct calls vagaira aate hain sir us pe kaisa response vagaira hai? Call bhi kam aaya sir ek bhi nahi aaya call mere paas mein.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Call ka agar dekhu main monthly abhi haan last month nahi aaya hai usse usse pehle August mein aapke paas teen call aaye the 100 plus.
Customer: Ek ya do call aaye the sir August start ki.
Executive: Sir ye sir leads ka Anand sahab leads ka consumption thoda sa badha lo aap leads ka consumption. Baad me lena marble bahut kam aati hai sir select ki aati hai unse jab mai baat karta hu to wo response nahi dete.
Executive: Hmm. Theek hai main ek baar dekhta hun. So main jo catalog mein kuch correction ki requirement hai theek hai wo main bolta hun.
Customer: Karegi wo theek hai. Aise aise aise karte raho sir aap. Jo bhi zarurat hai ek catalog ke aur wo sab aise karte raho aap.
Executive: Kya kehna sir aawaz nahi kat rahi thi.
Customer: Yes. Isi tarah to lagta hai India Mart ki regular nahi aate ho. Ek catalog ke liye bolta hai aap kitni baar karwaoge catalog me. Aap khud catalog karte ho iske andar bhi karna hai iska sab kuch aap hi kar rahe ho.
Executive: Karwata hun Anand sahab main theek hai.
(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not consuming leads regularly.

- Customer is not receiving enough calls.

- Customer needs catalog correction.



Resolution:

- Executive asked the customer to consume leads daily.

- Executive assured to look into the issue.

- Executive assured to inform about catalog correction.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, consumption, calls
